snippet: The Rev. Shawn Ratigan, a priest in Kansas City accused of producing pornographic photographs of young girls he knew, has filed notice that he will plead guilty in federal court.
abstract: Kansas City priest Rev Shawn Ratigan files notice that he will plead guilty in federal court to producing pornographic photographs of young girls.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Shawn Ratigan, a priest in Kansas City accused of producing pornographic photographs of young girls he knew, has filed notice that he will plead guilty in federal court.

headline.main: Missouri: Priest to Plead Guilty in Child Pornography Case
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Priest To Plead Guilty In Child Pornography Case
